Package com.azure.spring.cloud.service.implementation.storage.common

Interface StorageProperties

All Superinterfaces:
AzureProfileOptionsProvider, AzureProperties, ClientOptionsProvider, ConnectionStringProvider, ProxyOptionsProvider, RetryOptionsProvider, SasTokenProvider, TokenCredentialOptionsProvider
All Known Subinterfaces:
BlobServiceClientProperties, QueueServiceClientProperties, ShareServiceClientProperties
All Known Implementing Classes:
AzureEventHubsProperties.Processor.BlobCheckpointStore, AzureStorageBlobProperties, AzureStorageFileShareProperties, AzureStorageProperties, AzureStorageQueueProperties, StorageQueueProperties
public interface StorageProperties extends AzureProperties, RetryOptionsProvider, SasTokenProvider, ConnectionStringProvider
Common properties for all Azure Storage services.
